amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: TITLE VI--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS SEC.__. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to eliminate or restrict programs that are for the reforestation of urban areas.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 20 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to be used to eliminate or restrict programs that are for the reforestation of urban areas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A026) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee (TX).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
